name: Stone Crawler
storyline: Stone Crawler is a turn based rpg that has the player taking the role of a human who has mysteriously awakened in the Scilo, a dungeon in space that houses other humans that have awakened and spirits that haunt the mansion. The player will make their way up through the prison as they discover the secrets of the prison and the human organizations that intend to control the fate of everyone in the Scilo.
summary: A Windows 10 rpg developed in C which takes influence from rpgs such as Shin Megami Tensei, Persona 2, Final Fantasy, and Dragon Quest
